bug.author: treuille
bug.summary: The window title when running `streamlit run <URL>` should be nicer
bug.description:
<denchmark-h:h1>Summary</denchmark-h>
It would be nice if streamlit run URL had a nicer title, perhaps derived from the URL itself. <denchmark-h:h2>Steps to reproduce</denchmark-h>
Run the following to <denchmark-link:https://github.com/streamlit/demo-uber-nyc-pickups>get the uber demo</denchmark-link> : pip install --upgrade streamlit altair streamlit run https://raw.githubusercontent.com/streamlit/demo-uber-nyc-pickups/master/app.py <denchmark-h:h1>Behavior</denchmark-h>
<denchmark-h:h2>Actual behavior</denchmark-h>
We see a weird window title. <denchmark-link:https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/1673013/65822663-ef0b1580-e1fc-11e9-8e0c-343710091a55.png></denchmark-link>
<denchmark-h:h2>Expected behavior</denchmark-h>
I'd be nicer to parse the URL <denchmark-code>https://raw.githubusercontent.com/streamlit/demo-uber-nyc-pickups/master/app.py </denchmark-code>
parse out the app.py, and then name the window as if we had run <denchmark-code>streamlit run app.py </denchmark-code>
like this: <denchmark-link:https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/1673013/65822665-f3cfc980-e1fc-11e9-937d-3952a6d65eba.png></denchmark-link>
<denchmark-h:h2>Is this a regression?</denchmark-h>
no <denchmark-h:h1>Debug info</denchmark-h>
<denchmark-code>$ streamlit version && python --version && pyenv-version && sw_vers && "/Applications/Google Chrome.app/Contents/MacOS/Google Chrome" --version Streamlit, version 0.46.0 Python 3.6.5 pyenv 1.2.3 ProductName: Mac OS X ProductVersion: 10.14.6 BuildVersion: 18G95 Google Chrome 77.0.3865.90 </denchmark-code>
